verses.verse: To the chief Musician <S%H5329><s%> <S%H8764><s%>, A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Korach <S%H7141><s%>. O clap <S%H8628><s%> <S%H8798><s%> your hands <S%H3709><s%>, all ye people <S%H5971><s%>; shout <S%H7321><s%> <S%H8685><s%> unto 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> with the voice <S%H6963><s%> of triumph <S%H7440><s%>.
For the YY <S%H3068><s%> most high <S%H5945><s%> is terrible <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8737><s%>; he is a great <S%H1419><s%> King <S%H4428><s%> over all the earth <S%H776><s%>.
He shall subdue <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> under us, and the nations <S%H3816><s%> under our feet <S%H7272><s%>.
He shall choose <S%H977><s%> <S%H8799><s%> our inheritance <S%H5159><s%> for us, the excellency <S%H1347><s%> of Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> whom he loved <S%H157><s%> <S%H8804><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
'Elohim <S%H430><s%> is gone up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with a shout <S%H8643><s%>, the YY <S%H3068><s%> with the sound <S%H6963><s%> of a shofar <S%H7782><s%>.

Sing praises <S%H2167><s%> <S%H8761><s%> to 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, sing praises <S%H2167><s%> <S%H8761><s%>: sing praises <S%H2167><s%> <S%H8761><s%> unto our King <S%H4428><s%>, sing praises <S%H2167><s%> <S%H8761><s%>.
For 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> is the King <S%H4428><s%> of all the earth <S%H776><s%>: sing ye praises <S%H2167><s%> <S%H8761><s%> with understanding <S%H7919><s%> <S%H8688><s%>.

'Elohim <S%H430><s%> reigneth <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> over the heathen <S%H1471><s%>: 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> sitteth <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon the throne <S%H3678><s%> of his holiness <S%H6944><s%>.

The princes <S%H5081><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> are gathered together <S%H622><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, even the people <S%H5971><s%> of the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Avraham <S%H85><s%>: for the shields <S%H4043><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> belong unto 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>: he is greatly <S%H3966><s%> exalted <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8738><s%>.
